function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inaccurate data due to invalid questionnaire responses or unwillingness of participants to provide valid information.","category":"Inaccurate or Incomplete Data","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limitations of available data pose challenges to the analysis.","category":"Inaccurate or Incomplete Data","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Privacy risks and security breaches from iot devices and data collection","category":"Data Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reference to external sources without context","category":"Transparency and Accountability Issues","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate redundancy in data gathering and monitoring systems for covid-19 may result in incomplete or delayed information about hotspots and infected areas, leading to uncontrolled spread of the disease.","category":"Reliability and Quality of Data","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Privacy and surveillance concerns with aggressive contact tracing","category":"Surveillance and Monitoring Privacy Concerns","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High volume of articles and data collection may increase exposure risk to researchers","category":"Limited Accessibility and Data Equity","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inaccurate or sensationalized information","category":"Potential Misinformation and False Data","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate mapping of the real process due to incomplete or unreliable data","category":"Inaccurate or Incomplete Data","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Threats to data validity due to remote data collection","category":"Data Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Correlational findings instead of causal findings","category":"Inaccurate or Incomplete Data","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Allowing employees to use company resources for personal work and experimentation may lead to unhygienic conditions and increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Privacy risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inconsistencies in the database, stemming from misunderstandings, invalid responses, or typo errors, may compromise the accuracy of the analysis.","category":"Reliability and Quality of Data","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Assumptions for kruskal-wallis h test may not have been met","category":"Data Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overwhelm of information leading to entropy of the system","category":"Transparency and Accountability Issues","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Misuse and misrepresentation of wbe data","category":"Misuse of Personal Data","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Buffering measurements without sufficient quality assurance may lead to the inclusion of erroneous data in the analysis, impacting the accuracy of disease propagation monitoring","category":"Data Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Automatic detection of people using computer vision may lead to privacy concerns and surveillance issues","category":"Surveillance and Monitoring Privacy Concerns","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited data accuracy or completeness in the epidemiological data and npi timelines from the ministry of health and other sources.","category":"Inaccurate or Incomplete Data","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased demand for
